column2: Show Elector Titles of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName]

column2: Sometimes keeping track of the Prince-Electors of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName] is hard enough, but if you want to know which titles are the actual Elector Titles, then that can be quite a challenge as the game progresses. If you wanted to, e.g., become a Prince-Elector yourself, you'd definitely need to know the titles after which you were aiming. View it all easily right here.
column6: A veces, tener controlados a los Príncipes Electores del [emf_global_hre.GetFullName] es bastante difícil, pero si quieres saber qué títulos son los actuales Electores, puede ser desafiante a medida que el juego progresa. Si quieres, por ejemplo, convertirte en Príncipe Elector, tendrás que conocer los títulos que debes reclamar. Aquí puedes verlos fácilmente.

column2: Show Elector Titles of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName]
column6: Mostrar títulos electores del [emf_global_hre.GetFullName]

column2: Sometimes keeping track of the Prince-Electors of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName] is hard enough, but if you want to know which titles are the actual Elector Titles, then that can be quite a challenge as the game progresses. If you wanted to, e.g., become a Prince-Elector yourself, you'd definitely need to know the titles after which you were aiming. View it all easily right here.
column6: A veces, tener controlados a los Príncipes Electores del [emf_global_hre.GetFullName] es bastante difícil, pero si quieres saber qué títulos son los actuales Electores, puede ser desafiante a medida que el juego progresa. Si quieres, por ejemplo, convertirte en Príncipe Elector, tendrás que conocer los títulos que debes reclamar. Aquí puedes verlos fácilmente.

column2: As the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName] had fallen irredeemably from the lawful dominion of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName], the question of whom upon which its electorate should be conferred had arisen among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich].\n\nAfter much discussion and debate, a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] of the House [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing and the prestige of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] house among the great princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to receive the right and privilege to elect the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.
column6: Como el [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName] ha caído del dominio del [emf_global_hre.GetFullName], la duda de a quién será concedido el electorado había surgido entre los pares del [emf_global_hre.GetFullName].\n\nTras mucha discusión y debate, se ha llegado a un consenso para que el titular del [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] sea el nuevo Elector a perpetuidad. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] de la casa [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], por su prestigio y el de su casa entre los grandes príncipes del reino, destaca entre aquellos que son dignos de recibir el privilegio de elegir al [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] de los Romanos.

column2: As the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName] had fallen irredeemably from the lawful dominion of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName], the question of whom upon which its electorate should be conferred had arisen among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich].\n\nAfter much discussion and debate, a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing amongst the ecclesiastical princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to represent the will of [emf_new_elector.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the election of the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.
column6: Como el [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName] ha caído del dominio del [emf_global_hre.GetFullName], la duda de a quién será concedido el electorado había surgido entre los pares del [emf_global_hre.GetFullName].\n\nTras mucha discusión y debate, se ha llegado a un consenso para que el titular del [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] sea el nuevo Elector a perpetuidad. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName], por destacar entre los príncipes eclesiásticos del reino, y aquellos dignos de representar la voluntad de [emf_new_elector.Religion.GetHighGodName] en la elección del [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] de los Romanos.

column2: With the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName][emf_losing_elector.EMF_hre_65_GetElectorTitleLoserPhrase] falling into the demesne of the Elector [emf_gaining_elector.GetTitledName], [emf_former_elector_title.GetName] could no longer remain part of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich]'s electorate without sacrificing its integrity.\n\nAfter much discussion and careful negotiation among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich], a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] of the House [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing and the prestige of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] house among the great princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to receive the right and privilege to elect the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.
column6: Con la [emf_losing_elector.EMF_hre_65_GetElectorTitleLoserPhrase] del [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName] en manos del Elector del [emf_gaining_elector.GetTitledName], [emf_former_elector_title.GetName] no puede seguir formando parte del electorado del [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich] sin sacrificar su integridad.\n\nTras muchas discusiones y negociaciones entre los nobles del [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich], se ha llegado a un consenso para que el nuevo titular del [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] se convierta en elector a perpetuidad.  [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] de la Casa [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], por razones de peso y el prestigio de su casa entre los príncipes del reino, destaca entre los dignos de recibir el derecho y privilegio a elegir al [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] de los Romanos.

column2: With the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName][emf_losing_elector.EMF_hre_65_GetElectorTitleLoserPhrase] falling into the demesne of the Elector [emf_gaining_elector.GetTitledName], [emf_former_elector_title.GetName] could no longer remain part of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich]'s electorate without sacrificing its integrity.\n\nAfter much discussion and careful negotiation among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich], a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] of the House [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing amongst the ecclesiastical princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to represent the will of [emf_new_elector.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the election of the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.
column6: Con la [emf_losing_elector.EMF_hre_65_GetElectorTitleLoserPhrase] del [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName] en manos del Elector del [emf_gaining_elector.GetTitledName], [emf_former_elector_title.GetName] no puede seguir formando parte del electorado del [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich] sin sacrificar su integridad.\n\nTras muchas discusiones y negociaciones entre los nobles del [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich], se ha llegado a un consenso para que el nuevo titular del [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] se convierta en elector a perpetuidad.  [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] de la Casa [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], por destacar de entre los príncipes eclesiásticos del reino y de entre los dignos de representar la dignidad de [emf_new_elector.Religion.GetHighGodName] en la elección del [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] de los Romanos.

column2: With the disestablishment of the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName], the question of whom upon which its electorate should be conferred had arisen among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich].\n\nAfter much discussion and debate, a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] of the House [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing and the prestige of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] house among the great princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to receive the right and privilege to elect the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.
column6: Con la supresión del [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName], la cuestión de quién de entre el electorado debería ser nombrado había surgido entre los nobles del [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich].\n\nTras mucho debate, se ha llegado al consenso de que el titular del [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] se convierta en Elector a perpetuidad. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] de la Casa [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], por destacado y por el prestigio de su casa entre los grandes príncipes del reino, es digno de recibir el derecho y privilegio de elegir al [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] de los Romanos.

column2: With the disestablishment of the [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName], the question of whom upon which its electorate should be conferred had arisen among the peers of the [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich].\n\nAfter much discussion and debate, a consensus has largely been reached that the holder of the [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] shall become an Elector in perpetuity. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName], by reason of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] standing amongst the ecclesiastical princes of the realm, stands foremost among those worthy to represent the will of [emf_new_elector.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the election of the [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] of the Romans.
column6: Con la supresión del [emf_former_elector_title.GetFullName], la cuestión de quién de entre el electorado debería ser nombrado había surgido entre los nobles del [emf_global_hre.EMF_GetEmpireReich].\n\nTras mucho debate, se ha llegado al consenso de que el titular del [emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName] se convierta en Elector a perpetuidad. [emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName] de la Casa [emf_new_elector.GetOnlyDynastyName], por destacar entre los príncipes eclesiásticos del reino, es digno de representar la voluntad de [emf_new_elector.Religion.GetHighGodName] en la elección del [emf_global_hre.GetRulerTitle] de los Romanos.

column2: A decree will be prepared to extend the electorate to the §Y[emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName]§!, held by §Y[emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName]§!, and all of [emf_new_elector.GetPossPronoun] successors in perpetuity.
column6: Se preparará un decreto para extender el electorado al §Y[emf_new_elector_title.GetFullName]§!, en manos de §Y[emf_new_elector.GetTitledFirstName]§!, y todos sus sucesores a perpetuidad.

column2: As the peers have willed, I too declare it so.
column6: Como han querido los iguales, yo también lo declaro así.

column2: It has been rightly decided.

column2: Such a common cur does not deserve the dignity of an electorate!

column2: [Root.GetBestName] dethroned the Karlings from a traditionally Karling kingdom. [Root.GetSubjectPronounCap] is seen by many as part of the future while the Karling dynasty dominating Europe is waning.
column6: [Root.GetBestName] ha destronado a los Karlings de su tradicional reino Karling. [Root.GetElElla] es visto por muchos como parte de un nuevo futuro, mientras los Karling en Europa menguan.

column2: The §YHistorical Elector Titles§! of the [emf_global_hre.GetFullName] are the [e_hre.hre_title_1_per.GetFullName], the [e_hre.hre_title_2_per.GetFullName], the [e_hre.hre_title_3_per.GetFullName], the [e_hre.hre_title_4_per.GetFullName], the [e_hre.hre_title_5_per.GetFullName], the [e_hre.hre_title_6_per.GetFullName], and the [e_hre.hre_title_7_per.GetFullName].

[emf_global_hre.Get_only_du_RealmFull][emf_global_hre.GetFullName] sont [e_hre.hre_title_1_per.Get_only_le_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_1_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_2_per.Get_only_le_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_2_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_3_per.Get_only_le_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_3_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_4_per.Get_only_le_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_4_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_5_per.Get_only_le_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_5_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_6_per.Get_only_le_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_6_per.GetFullName] et [e_hre.hre_title_7_per.Get_only_le_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_7_per.GetFullName].
column4: Die §Yhistorischen Kurfürstentitel§! des [emf_global_hre.GetFullName] sind der [e_hre.hre_title_1_per.GetFullName], der [e_hre.hre_title_2_per.GetFullName], der [e_hre.hre_title_3_per.GetFullName], der [e_hre.hre_title_4_per.GetFullName], der [e_hre.hre_title_5_per.GetFullName], der [e_hre.hre_title_6_per.GetFullName] und der [e_hre.hre_title_7_per.GetFullName].
column6: Los §Ytítulos históricos de electores§! [emf_global_hre.Get_deldela_RealmFull][emf_global_hre.GetFullName] son [e_hre.hre_title_1_per.Get_ella_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_1_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_2_per.Get_ella_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_2_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_3_per.Get_ella_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_3_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_4_per.Get_ella_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_4_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_5_per.Get_ella_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_5_per.GetFullName], [e_hre.hre_title_6_per.Get_ella_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_6_per.GetFullName] y [e_hre.hre_title_7_per.Get_ella_RealmFull][e_hre.hre_title_7_per.GetFullName].
